Vse ustvarjene besede bodo sestavljene iz tega niza malih črk, preostale črke pa bodo neuporabljene. Ker statistika za črke ni znana, so ustrezni indikatorji sivi.

children.value: This web application will help you to learn
which means typing through muscle memory without using your eyesight to find the keys. It can improve your typing speed and accuracy dramatically. The opposite is
, a method of typing in which you look at the keyboard instead of the screen, and use only the index fingers.
This is a short tutorial that will explain how this application works.
You can use the left and right arrow keys to navigate through these slides.

26l1xsOW.value: Score of the last lesson in abstract points. Scores are greater when you type faster and with fewer errors.

28myoc+l.value: is an observation that in many real-life numerical data sets, the leading digit is likely to be small.

2GpTROU+.value: Manually unlock the remaining letters. Use this option if want a greater variety of words. We recommend using this option sparingly and stick to the algorithm to unlock letters for you.

30lGtuik.value: This chart shows the average typing speed for each individual key.

children.value: These charts visualize the efficiency of different keyboard layouts. An efficiency is a measure of how easy it is to type on a keyboard.
The circles show relative key frequencies, and the arcs show relative key pair frequencies.

It is easier to type when the most frequent keys are on the home row, and when the most frequent key pairs are typed with different fingers and hands. Therefore an efficient layout has the largest circles on the home row. It also has arcs that are evenly distributed across the keyboard, long and horizontal, rather than short and diagonal, because it indicates the frequent switching of fingers and hands.

3UivpTPo.value: Compete against other players in this online multiplayer game. The faster you type, the faster your car goes. Type as fast as you can to win the race!

3iSUxP83.value: Sort letters in such a way that the letters from the home row come first, then the letters from the top row, and finally all the remaining letters. Home row is the row with the CapsLock key. Top row is the row with the Tab key. It is easier and faster to type when your fingers do not need to move away from the home row. This feature works best with optimized layouts, like Dvorak or Colemak. In the Qwerty layout, the only vowel on the home row is A, so it severely limits the choice of words, and the algorithm will use more pseudo-words than usual.

3l9Ko227.value: Ciljna hitrost se uporablja za merjenje stopnje zaupanja in barve črke. Bolj ko se približujete ciljni hitrosti, bolj zelena postane črka. V vodenem načinu je črka odklenjena le, ko presežete prag ciljne hitrosti. Ko odklenete vse črke, lahko povečate ciljno hitrost, da se vrnete v učni način in odklenete črke znova, tokrat z višjim pragom hitrosti. Priporočamo, da povečate ciljno hitrost postopoma le, ko imate vse črke nad ciljno hitrostjo.

426G6pUn.value: Show a guided tour with help slides.

children.value: Initially it starts generating words from a small subset of the most frequent letters in the alphabet.

When you are typing these words, the application measures the time-to-type metric for every letter in that subset. This time is used to measure your learning progress. The more familiar you become with a letter, the less time it takes for you to type it.
Once you familiarize yourself with the entire current subset of letters, the algorithm expands it by adding more and more letters to the subset.
Ta spletna aplikacija vam bo pomagala pri učenju
, kar pomeni tipkanje s pomočjo mišičnega spomina, ne da bi pri iskanju tipk na tipkovnici uporabljali vid. Lahko dramatično izboljša vašo hitrost in natančnost tipkanja. Nasprotje je
, način tipkanja, pri katerem gledate na tipkovnico namesto na zaslon in uporabljate samo kazalce.

children.value: Ta aplikacija uporablja edinstven pristop. Uporablja statistiko in pametne algoritme za samodejno ustvarjanje lekcij tipkanja, ki ustrezajo vaši trenutni ravni spretnosti. Deluje tako, da ponavlja naslednji cikel:

Algoritem za vas ustvari seznam naključnih besed na podlagi vaših veščin tipkanja. Vaša raven spretnosti se meri na podlagi do sedaj zbranih statističnih podatkov o tipkanju. Besede so sestavljene iz niza črk, ki jih izbere algoritem.
Vnesete podane besede. Poskušate narediti čim manj napak.

Med tipkanjem algoritem zbira vašo statistiko tipkanja, kot je meritev časa do tipkanja za vsako posamezno tipko. Na koncu se ti statistični podatki uporabijo za ustvarjanje naslednjega seznama besed za prvi korak.
Na vsaki stopnji samo vnesete ponujene sezname besed, ostalo pa naredi računalnik.

AYmbiu/p.value: , s 35 na 70 WPM po 2 urah in 20 minutah vadbe v 12 dneh.

B8IDW7+a.value: Use the dictionary words as much as possible, and if not many such words are available, then use computer-generated pseudo-words. Natural words might be easier to type. Pseudo-words offer a much greater variety of letter combinations. If this option is enabled, you will see more pseudo-words in the beginning, when the letter list is short. However, as you unlock few more letters, there is a good chance that only the dictionary words will be used.

C7qaXSdX.value: Izvorna koda keybr.com je na voljo na Githubu.

children.value: Ko se vaša hitrost tipkanja izboljša in vse črke končno postanejo zelene, se naboru doda nova črka S. Naključne besede bodo ustvarjene iz tega novega razširjenega niza črk. Črka S je ciljna črka in se pojavi v vsaki ustvarjeni besedi. Ponovno je barva indikatorja te črke siva, ker statistika tipkanja ni znana.

children.value: Our teaching method is based on these principles:
No boring repetitive exercises. Unlike most other typing tutors, this application does not force you to repeat the same lessons like ‘
’ over and over again. This is very annoying and contributes very little to your overall learning.

This application uses a sophisticated computer algorithm to generate typing lessons that match your skill level. These lessons consist of random words generated using a subset of the full alphabet of letters. The size of the subset and individual letter frequency is controlled by the algorithm, which provides you with the best learning experience.

G89OM3rg.value: Adjust the amount of capital letters added to the lesson text. Use this option to practice typing the capital letters. We recommend to increase this value only if you have all letters above the target speed.

GD3rLsY5.value: Ali ste prepričani, da želite zbrisati svoj račun? Ta ... je trajna in je ni mogoče razveljaviti. Lahko pa si vedno ustvarite nov račun.

GTKgbf6U.value: , od 30 do 70 WPM po 4 urah in 20 minutah vadbe v 15 dneh.

Gj3ZMyt0.value: Adjust the number of words in the lesson text. Making lessons longer can improve your learning.

children.value: Ustvarite račun, da shranite svoje podatke o tipkanju na naših strežnikih v oblaku. To vam omogoča dostop do vašega profila s katerim koli računalnikom ali brskalnikom. Če nimate računa, se vaši podatki o tipkanju shranjujejo lokalno in so dostopni samo s trenutnega računalnika.
Ne shranjujemo gesel. Namesto tega uporabljamo storitve tretjih oseb za preverjanje pristnosti naših uporabnikov. Ponujamo več priročnih načinov za ustvarjanje računa in prijavo.
Kadarkoli se lahko odjavite. Brisanje računa je tako preprosto kot njegovo ustvarjanje.

children.value: Ta aplikacija generira naključne, a berljive in izgovorljive besede, uporabljajoč fonetična pravila vašega maternega jezika. Te besede izgledajo skoraj naravno in pogosto tudi so. Tipkanje smiselnega besedila je veliko lažje kot ponavljanje naključnih črk, in vam pomaga zapomniti pogoste kombinacije tipk. Zadnja točka je ključna. Na primer, skoraj nemogoče je, da bi črka ‘
’ v angleščini, in to kombinacijo nikoli ne boste vpisali v tej aplikaciji. Namesto tega boste vpisali bolj pogoste besede, kot so «
,» in tako naprej. Kmalu se boste naučili, kako hitro vpisati kombinacijo «
Besede se generirajo iz črk, ki so izbrane z uporabo naslednjih pravil.

To je pričakovano, vaš cilj je še vedno enak, narediti novo ciljno črko zeleno, da odklenete naslednjo.

children.value: When the algorithm includes a new letter to the current subset, the frequency of this letter is artificially increased so that it will be included in every generated word of a lesson.
The algorithm can also artificially rearrange letter frequencies, placing an emphasis on the letters with the worst time-to-type metric.
This means you will always be typing the letters that you are least familiar with.

Accuracy is computed as the percentage of characters typed without errors. Many typos in the same position count as one error.

children.value: Establishing connection to the game server.
This is the virtual keyboard. It helps you memorize key positions. Use it to find the keys and try not to look at your physical keyboard. There are small bumps on the

keys of your keyboard. Use these to correctly position your index fingers without having to look at the keys. Once your index fingers are in the right position you will be able to locate the remainder of the keys.
Če si dovolj vztrajen, bodo prej ali slej vse črke postale zelene. Čestitamo, dosegli ste svoj glavni cilj! Vendar to ne pomeni, da se morate nehati učiti, lahko nadaljujete, kolikor dolgo želite.

oiLMsWOv.value: This chart shows the learning progress overview for all keys.

qGIjf0xj.value: A calibrated key with the lowest confidence level. The more times you press this key, the more accurate this metric becomes.

r95sp74G.value: This chart shows the typing speed change for each individual key.

children.value: This is the typing score indicator in abstract points and the difference from the average value.

The score is calculated from your typing speed, error count, and the current size of the letter set. The formula is designed to reward for typing speed, and punish for error count. You cannot obtain a high score by typing fast while also making many errors.
Users who score the highest points are recorded in the high score table.

ruJxBMTr.value: Odstotek tipk, vnesenih na vrstico Tab, manj kot je, bolje je.

sCOSQnxe.value: Prijavite se z željenim socialnim omrežjem. Spoštujemo vašo zasebnost in obljubljamo, da ne bomo nikoli vsiljevali vašega zidu, prijateljev ali e-pošte.

sa/SLiF6.value: How your typing speed is changing with each lesson.

sj81Fs0I.value: Algoritem se začne z začetnimi črkami

children.value: The table of the fastest typists for the last few days, arranged by their scores from best to worst. Typing score is measured from typing speed, text length, the number of different characters in the text, and the number of errors. The formula is designed in such a way to reward for a faster speed, longer text and a larger alphabet, but to punish for the number of errors.

This is the text board. It displays the text to type out. The text changes for each new lesson. The text is generated automatically from the current subset of letters. Most of the words are not real, but are generated using the phonetic rules of your language so they sound natural and should be easy to pronounce. Besides being funny, this gives us the flexibility to use more words than actually exist.
da odklenete dodatne funkcije in uživajte v izkušnji brez oglasov. Tukaj je list ugodnosti premium računa:
Oglasi so lahko moteči in ovirajo vaš napredek. To je dober način, da se jih znebite.
Sledilniki neizogibno pridejo z oglasi. Odstrani vse sledilnike za kompletno varnost na spletu.
Oglasi vzamejo nekaj časa, da se naložijo. To pomeni, da se vse strani hitreje naložijo.

Je enokratni 
nakup, ki vam zagotavljana doživljenjski dostop. To NI ponavljajoča naročnina.

xlxLJra+.value: Ko se osredotočite na novo tipko, je zelo verjetno, da se hitrost prejšnjih tipk zmanjša. Če je ta možnost onemogočena, odklenete novo tipko le z dvigom hitrosti osredotočene tipke nad ciljno hitrostjo. Če je ta možnost omogočena, boste morali dvigniti hitrost osredotočene tipke in vse prejšnje tipke nad ciljno hitrostjo. To bo otežilo odklepanje novih tipk. Vendar pa bo tudi otežilo pozabljanje starih tipk.

children.value: Izbrali smo nekaj primerov profilov, da vam pokažemo, kako ljudje napredujejo pri učenju tipkanja z dotikom pri uporabi te aplikacije. To so pravi, anonimizirani uporabniški profili. Upajmo, da vas bodo navdihnili za nadaljnje učenje!

children.value: Ko začnete vnašati ustvarjene besede, računalnik zbira vašo statistiko tipkanja. Indikatorji začnejo spreminjati barvo iz rdeče v zeleno. Rdeča barva pomeni, da je hitrost tipkanja za posamezno tipko počasna, zelena barva pa nasprotno. Na tej stopnji je vaš cilj narediti vse črke zelene z izboljšanjem hitrosti tipkanja. Upoštevajte, da je v tem primeru črka »

« poudarjena, saj ima najslabšo meritev hitrosti tipkanja, zato postane ciljna črka. Ciljna črka je vključena v vsako ustvarjeno besedo in to je ključna informacija, ki jo morate poznati. To pomeni, da v danem trenutku vadite točno tisti ključ, ki vam povzroča največ težav.
